constituent: smash, stone, rock, ninety, nine, baseball, ten, needle
heisigStory: We begin with the two elements on the right, baseball and needle. Since they will be coming together from time to time, let us give the two of them the sense of a game of cricket in which a needle is laid across the wicket. Then imagine using a rock for a ball. A smash hit would probably splinter the bat in all directions, and a smashing pitch would do the same with the needle wicket.
koohiiStory1: To SMASH a STONE you need to hit it NINE or TEN times.
koohiiStory2: The Stones (the Rolling Stones) are 90 aged but they´ve done a new SMASH hit!
readingExamples: 砕く (くだ.く), 砕ける (くだ.ける)
